bibdata.title: IEEEE Draft Standard for Definite-Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear--Amendment 1
IEEEE Draft Standard for Definite-Purpose Switching Devices for Use in Metal-Enclosed Low-Voltage Power Circuit Breaker Switchgear--Amendment 1
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std PC37.13.1a /D2, Jun 2009

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: This amendment to the standard revises the short-circuit rating and test requirements for definite purpose switching devices for use in metal-enclosed low-voltage power circuit breaker switchgear.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.keyword: low voltage ac power circuit breaker
